name: FPS Swinging Prototype
description:
Tutorial:

  • WASD - Move.
  • Shift: Sprint/Pull toward tether
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • R: Reset position to start of map.
  • Hold left click to enable swing.

Optional:

  • Hold left click & press left CTRL if you're having issues starting the swing. It will give you a huge boost.
  • Also, if you hold SPACEBAR while landing, you bounce, keeping momentum & jump height.
  • Air strafing is possible with A & D.
  • You can adjust your movement by looking where you want to go and hold W.

This demo gamemode: Hit all red targets. Nothing happens if you win.

This is my first solo made game and it's mostly a showcase/portfolio of what I've been able to create. Maybe sometime in the future I'll make a full-fletched, polished swinging game.
